ingles: So when the Sabbath was over, Mary Magdalene, Mary the mother of James, and Salome bought spices in order to come and apply them to his body.
portugues: Então, passado o sábado, Maria Madalena, Maria, mãe de Tiago, e Salomé compraram aromas para passar no corpo dele.

ingles: And very early on the first day of the week when the sun had risen, they came to the tomb.
portugues: E, no primeiro dia da semana, chegaram bem cedo ao túmulo, depois de o sol se levantar.

ingles: They were saying to one another: "Who will roll the stone away from the entrance of the tomb for us?"
portugues: Diziam umas às outras: "Quem rolará a pedra da entrada do túmulo para nós?"

ingles: But when they looked up, they saw that the stone had been rolled away, although it was very large.
portugues: Mas, ao levantarem os olhos, viram que a pedra, embora muito grande, tinha sido rolada.

ingles: When they entered into the tomb, they saw a young man sitting on the right side, clothed in a white robe, and they were stunned.
portugues: Quando elas entraram no túmulo, viram um jovem sentado à direita, usando uma veste comprida, branca, e ficaram espantadas.

ingles: He said to them: "Do not be stunned. You are looking for Jesus the Nazarene who was executed on the stake. He was raised up. He is not here. Look, here is the place where they laid him.
portugues: Ele lhes disse: "Não se assustem. Vocês estão procurando Jesus, o Nazareno, que foi morto na estaca. Ele foi levantado; não está aqui. Vejam, este é o lugar onde o colocaram.

ingles: But go, tell his disciples and Peter, 'He is going ahead of you into Galilee. You will see him there, just as he told you.'"
portugues: Agora vão, digam aos discípulos dele e a Pedro: 'Ele está indo adiante de vocês para a Galileia. Ali o verão, assim como ele lhes disse.'"

ingles: So when they came out, they fled from the tomb, trembling and overwhelmed with emotion. And they said nothing to anyone, for they were in fear.
portugues: Então elas saíram e fugiram do túmulo, tremendo e tomadas de emoção. E não disseram nada a ninguém, pois estavam com medo.
